entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lansdowne House Airport 05:32 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.7°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -19.0°C
Wind: WNW 21 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
